assetProfile.address2: 5th Floor Opp. Fire Brigade Station Ring Road
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Sumeet Industries Limited manufactures and sells yarns in India. The company provides polyester chips, partially oriented yarns, fully draw yarns, polyester texturized yarns, and carpet yarns. It also exports its products to Egypt, Saudi Arabia, China, Argentina, Poland, Portugal, Morocco, Columbia, Bangladesh, Russia, Ethiopia, Mexico, Nepal, Brazil, Peru, Algeria, Thailand, the United States, Singapore, Turkey, etc. The company was formerly known as Sumeet Synthetics Limited and changed its name to Sumeet Industries Limited in 1996. Sumeet Industries Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Surat, India.
